snippet: Weak hiring and manufacturing numbers and poor corporate earnings seem to indicate a slowdown in the economy.
abstract: Signs of slowing economy drags down stock market as the three major market indexes fell by 0.9 percent.
lead_paragraph: Weak hiring and manufacturing numbers and poor corporate earnings seem to indicate a slowdown in the economy.

headline.main: Wall St. Declines on a Day Of Disappointing Signs
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Declines on a Day Of Disappointing Signs
